Package org.bluezoo.gumdrop.imap.handler

Interface SelectState

  • public interface SelectState
    Operations available when responding to SELECT or EXAMINE commands.

    This interface is provided to AuthenticatedHandler.select(org.bluezoo.gumdrop.mailbox.MailboxStore, java.lang.String, org.bluezoo.gumdrop.imap.handler.SelectState) and AuthenticatedHandler.examine(org.bluezoo.gumdrop.mailbox.MailboxStore, java.lang.String, org.bluezoo.gumdrop.imap.handler.SelectState) for opening mailboxes.

    Author:
    Chris Burdess
    See Also:
    AuthenticatedHandler.select(org.bluezoo.gumdrop.mailbox.MailboxStore, java.lang.String, org.bluezoo.gumdrop.imap.handler.SelectState), SelectedHandler

    • Method Detail

      • selectOk

        void selectOk​(Mailbox mailbox,
              boolean readOnly,
              java.util.Set<Flag> flags,
              java.util.Set<Flag> permanentFlags,
              int exists,
              int recent,
              long uidValidity,
              long uidNext,
              SelectedHandler handler)
        Mailbox selected successfully.

        Sends the required untagged responses (FLAGS, EXISTS, RECENT, UIDVALIDITY, UIDNEXT) and a tagged OK response.

        Parameters:
        mailbox - the selected mailbox
        readOnly - true if the mailbox was opened read-only (EXAMINE)
        flags - the defined flags for this mailbox
        permanentFlags - the flags that can be permanently stored
        exists - the number of messages in the mailbox
        recent - the number of recent messages
        uidValidity - the UID validity value
        uidNext - the predicted next UID
        handler - receives commands for the selected mailbox

      • selectOk

        void selectOk​(Mailbox mailbox,
              boolean readOnly,
              java.util.Set<Flag> flags,
              SelectedHandler handler)
        Mailbox selected successfully, using mailbox API for details.

        Convenience method that queries the mailbox for EXISTS, RECENT, UIDVALIDITY, and UIDNEXT.

        Parameters:
        mailbox - the selected mailbox
        readOnly - true if the mailbox was opened read-only (EXAMINE)
        flags - the defined flags for this mailbox
        handler - receives commands for the selected mailbox

      • selectFailed

        void selectFailed​(java.lang.String message,
                  AuthenticatedHandler handler)
        Select failed for some reason other than mailbox not found.
        Parameters:
        message - the error message
        handler - continues receiving authenticated commands

        Parameters:

        Parameters:
        message - the error message
        handler - continues receiving authenticated commands

      • serverShuttingDown

        void serverShuttingDown()
        Server is shutting down, close gracefully.

        Sends an untagged BYE response indicating the server is shutting down and closes the connection.
